body.name: Sweetcrispy Dresser for Bedroom, Chest of 8 Drawers Cloth Dresser, Closet Storage Clothes Organizer Tower with Fabric Bins, Metal Frame, Wood Tabletop for Living Room, Kids Room, Nursery, Entryway

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Multifunction Cabinet】 Use our stylish storage organizers to find endless organizational possibilities. Just place this space-saver drawer in the closet as a cabinet to offer a home for workout gear, blankets and lingerie; place it in the nursery as a chest of drawers to store baby clothes and baby stuff; place it in the entryway for storage saving unit for frequently used items.

【Large Capacity】 A great volume of storage with 8 separate drawers provides endless organizational possibilities, you are able to fit about 12-15 rolled-up t-shirts or about 8 pairs of jeans in 1 drawer.The wood top is great for keeping the most-used items within your reach. With plentiful space to organize all your belongings, your room will always be kept in perfect order. Overall dimensions: 35.4" L x 11.8" W x 47.2" H. Drawer dimensions: 14.4" L x 11.8" W x 8.3" H.

【Durable Material】This drawer (non-wood drawer) is made of cationic materials, all other sides and gaps are made of high-quality breathable and non-woven synthetic fiber, harmless and wear-resistant, suitable for kids, teens and adults. Easy-pull drawers with handles for smooth opening and closing. For easy cleaning, just wipe it clean with a piece of damp cloth and get it air-dried.

【Quality Construction】 This chest of drawers combines water-resistant MDF boards with a durable steel frame, a cross support bar and a drawer support shelf to make it sturdy under full load(50lb). Anti-tipping accessories are also equipped on the tall dresser to prevent accidents. With 4 adjustable feet, you won’t have to worry about stability even on uneven floors, and it is also adaptable to different spaces.

【Easy to Assemble】The packages will come with all the tools and accessories for quick assembly, which allows only about 20 minutes to assemble your dresser organizer with detailed instructions and the installation video. If you have encountered any problems, we would be delighted to help you find a solution and reply to your email within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price
reviews.reviewText: I was a little worried about buying this because I read a few reviews that mentioned how badly it smelled. It does have a little bit of a smell, but it’s not pungent enough for me to hate it! It’s a very nice and sturdy dresser. It was simple to put together. I put it together in less than an hour with no complications! All the parts were there and it was ready to go! It fits a lot of my clothes and I may just buy another one because it’s super cute!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchases as a used like a new item, needed it for a spare room the six exactly what I needed super cute, small and useful easy to put together match the other furniture in the room perfectly very good bargain would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It holds so much.
reviews.reviewText: I am extremely happy with my purchase. The dresser is not only stylish and sleek, but it also provides ample storage space for all my clothing and accessories.The build quality of this dresser is impressive. The materials used are sturdy and durable, making it a long-lasting investment. The drawers glide smoothly, and the handles are comfortable to grip. I appreciate that each drawer is spacious enough to hold a good amount of clothes, and the overall size of the dresser fits perfectly in my bedroom. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super cute but smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: It’s shorter than I thought it would be but I’m not complaining because it’s for my infant daughter. It was easy to put together. Instructions were straight forward. Only took about an hour to assemble. My only complaint is the smell. It’s strong but I’m hoping it goes away after some time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ll be honest, I was a little skeptical about this dresser when I purchased it. However, it’s perfect, doesn’t look cheap & easy to put together. It took me about 45 mins to build it. This definitely isn’t a “get what you pay for” piece of furniture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great for kids room or organization in the closet. It’s very light weight and has “sliders” on the bottom of the feet for easy mobility. I was able to fit a 32 inch tv and an Xbox on top of it. I would suggest to had a support bar to the top and into the wall in case you have children who climb stuff because it can easily tip with enough force. I will say it was worth $60 ish dollars and plan to purchase 2 more (I already bought 4). It can be assembled by one person but my children helped and it took maybe 25 minutes. I would suggest to use a small hand held drill if you have one to screw in the drawer handled but the Allen wrench has a Phillips head on the other end in case you don’t have a drill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It has a terrible/horrible odor.
reviews.reviewText: This is easy to put together. It looks very nice. It has a terrible ODOR. I have left the drawers sitting outside without the insert (to give the material drawers a bottom) and there is still a bad odor. I cannot explain it. Unless it is the plastic that is used in the material. Even Febreze hasn't helped. I purchased these drawers in october. It is now february. The drawer smell almost as bad as they did in the beginning. I have had them in an unused room, drawers open, hasn't helped! If I can give this product a zero I would.
